sqlMap.select:
SELECT APP_TRACT_ID ,APP_TRACT_NAME ,TRANS_MER_ID ,PAY_TRACT ,TRANS_RATE_COST ,TRANS_LOWEST_COST ,TRANS_HIGHEST_COST ,BYPAY_PROFIT ,STATUS ,CREATE_TIME ,REMARK ,RESERVED ,PER_CARD_QUOTA ,CARD_QUOTA ,CARD_COUNT ,TRANS_TIME_BEGIN ,TRANS_TIME_END ,TRACT_TYPE ,TERMINAL_ID ,SPID FROM APP_TRACT_INFO WHERE 1=1 AND APP_TRACT_INFO.END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
(APP_TRACT_ID) =#app_tract_id#
(APP_TRACT_NAME) Like '%'||(#app_tract_name:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_MER_ID) Like '%'||(#trans_mer_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(PAY_TRACT) Like '%'||(#pay_tract:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_RATE_COST) Like '%'||(#trans_rate_cost:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_LOWEST_COST) Like '%'||(#trans_lowest_cost:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_HIGHEST_COST) Like '%'||(#trans_highest_cost:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(BYPAY_PROFIT) Like '%'||(#bypay_profit:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(STATUS) Like '%'||(#status:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CREATE_TIME) Like '%'||(#create_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(REMARK) Like '%'||(#remark:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED) Like '%'||(#reserved:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(PER_CARD_QUOTA) Like '%'||(#per_card_quota:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CARD_QUOTA) Like '%'||(#card_quota:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CARD_COUNT) Like '%'||(#card_count:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_TIME_BEGIN) Like '%'||(#trans_time_begin:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_TIME_END) Like '%'||(#trans_time_end:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRACT_TYPE) Like '%'||(#tract_type:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TERMINAL_ID) Like '%'||(#terminal_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SPID) Like '%'||(#spid:VARCHAR#)||'%'
$orderStr$

SELECT count(1) FROM APP_TRACT_INFO WHERE 1=1 AND APP_TRACT_INFO.END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
(APP_TRACT_ID) =#app_tract_id#
(APP_TRACT_NAME) Like '%'||(#app_tract_name:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_MER_ID) Like '%'||(#trans_mer_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(PAY_TRACT) Like '%'||(#pay_tract:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_RATE_COST) Like '%'||(#trans_rate_cost:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_LOWEST_COST) Like '%'||(#trans_lowest_cost:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_HIGHEST_COST) Like '%'||(#trans_highest_cost:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(BYPAY_PROFIT) Like '%'||(#bypay_profit:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(STATUS) Like '%'||(#status:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CREATE_TIME) Like '%'||(#create_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(REMARK) Like '%'||(#remark:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED) Like '%'||(#reserved:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(PER_CARD_QUOTA) Like '%'||(#per_card_quota:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CARD_QUOTA) Like '%'||(#card_quota:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CARD_COUNT) Like '%'||(#card_count:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_TIME_BEGIN) Like '%'||(#trans_time_begin:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_TIME_END) Like '%'||(#trans_time_end:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRACT_TYPE) Like '%'||(#tract_type:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TERMINAL_ID) Like '%'||(#terminal_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SPID) Like '%'||(#spid:VARCHAR#)||'%'
